Description:
We are growing! We are currently looking to hire a Corporate Legal Associate to be based in Lebanon. This role is fully Remote.Who we are:Founded in China in 2006, our story started with two entrepreneurs. Today, we’re proud to be a global business. From Shanghai to Paris, we have 12 offices and operate across four continents in 70 countries. We are home to over 160 professionals from around the world, working together to serve more than 200 luxury clients.At CXG, we love to evolve, elevate, and transform experiences while bringing brand promises to life. We offer strategic solutions that impact performance and elevate the customer experience of some of the world’s most iconic premium and luxury brands.What you will be doing:You will join a dynamic and fast-paced environment, and you will be reporting to the Corporate Legal Advisor.You will assist the Legal Department to implement legal processes, review and monitor the compliance obligations of the Group entities abroad.Your duties will also involve:Drafting and reviewing legal agreements and any other legal documents
Analyzing and synthesizing new laws, regulations and market practices which may impact the business
Collaborating with members of our international teams to develop new processes and offer expert advice on all legal matters
Preparing reports for the legal department and the corporate documentation of the entities of the Group
Ensuring the compliance of the Group with the law while taking into account its operational effectiveness
